category.description: Medical equipment, aids and other appliances normally intended to alleviate or treat disability, for the exclusive personal use of the disabled, including the repair of such goods

vatRateResults.comment: Disabled technical aids and/or accessories, as listed in Order no. A1-338,  approved by the Minister of Social Security and Labor in 2006 December 19th or others (non-exhaustive list of technical assistance measures with different conditions of supply (must be documented for dissability purposes or  dissabled person's actual use) of such measures; see Comment on VAT Law on STI website)

CHAPTER 30 - PHARMACEUTICAL PRODUCTS
Prepared culture media for the development or maintenance of micro-organisms (including viruses and the like) or of plant, human or animal cells

category.description: Pharmaceutical products of a kind normally used for health care, prevention of illness and as treatment for medical and veterinary purposes,…

vatRateResults.comment: Applicable for medicaments, medical aids and food products for special medical purposes, fully or partially compensated by the Compulsory Health Insurance Fund (at the moment of acquisition), as well as for all non-compensated prescribed medicines (entered into the Lithuanian or EU register of prescribed medications)

code.description: Newspapers, journals and periodicals, whether or not illustrated or containing advertising material
On-line newspapers

vatRateResults.comment: With the exception of erotic and/or violent publications, or publications non-compliant with the professional ethics. Applies for  printed and (or) electronic newspapers, magazines and other periodicals.

code.description: Newspapers, journals and periodicals, whether or not illustrated or containing advertising material
On-line journals and periodicals

vatRateResults.comment: With the exception of erotic and/or violent publications, or publications non-compliant with the professional ethics. Applies for printed and (or) electronic periodicals.

code.description: Fuel wood, in logs, in billets, in twigs, in faggots or in similar forms; wood in chips or particles; sawdust and wood waste and scrap, whether or not agglomerated in logs, briquettes, pellets or similar forms

category.description: Until 1 January 2030: Wood used as firewood

vatRateResults.comment: Since 1st 2019 the reduced 9 % VAT rate applies to firewood and wood products for heating supplied to energy consumers – households.

code.description: Printed books, brochures, leaflets and similar printed matter, whether or not in single sheets

Other printed matter, including printed pictures and photographs

category.description: Supply, including on loan by libraries, of books, newspapers and periodicals either on physical means of support …

vatRateResults.comment: Applies for printed and electronic books as well as printed and electronic non-periodical information publications (see non-exhaustive most common publications supplied list in Comment of VAT Law on the STI website)

code.description: Steam and hot water; steam and hot water supply services

vatRateResults.comment: Applies to the district heating energy supplied to residential premises.

code.description: Trade services of water through mains

vatRateResults.comment: Applies to the hot water or cold water for preparing of hot water, supplied to residential premises.
